arts.ttl: Tony Mowbray singles out 'dream' West Brom player for special praise
arts.sum: West Brom head coach Tony Mowbray was full of praise for Tom Fellows after the attacker's performance in the 2-1 win over Watford West Brom head coach Tony Mowbray eulogised Tom Fellows' standout display, highlighting the young player's dual assists during their 2-1 triumph against Watford in the Championship.
Moussa Sissoko's goal not enough to prevent defeat at The Hawthorns.

arts.ttl: West Brom end three-game losing streak to beat Watford and boost play-off hopes
arts.sum: Karlan Grant and Mikey Johnston put the Baggies in control before Moussa Sissoko pulled one back for Watford.

arts.ttl: Houston Dynamo sign goalkeeper Jonathan Bond from Watford
arts.sum: Houston Dynamo have announced the signing of Jonathan Bond from Watford. Bond, with 214 career games, strengthens Houston's goalkeeping options.
